player1.required: Please set up a name between 1 and 15 characters.
player1.pattern: Only include numbers and uppercase & lowercase letters
player1.duplicate: Player1's name cannot be same as player2's name.

player2.required: Please set up a name between 1 and 15 characters.
player2.pattern: Only include numbers and uppercase & lowercase letters
